title: Fred Armisen
description: Samantha Bee sits down with actor, comedian, and drummer extraordinaire, Fred Armisen to discuss returning to live comedy shows, performing for an audience, why every house should have a drum set, the first concerts they ever went to and what it's like to meet your idols.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
